steps.description: Kill Crag Boars and Large Crag Boars. Loot them for their Chunks of Boar Meat (you will need 10)
Travel to Kharanos. Grind to 2145/+2800xp killing Crag Boars en-route
Travel to Kharanos. Kill Crag Boars en-route
Talk to Senir Whitebeard and turn in Senir's Observations
Talk to Gimrizz Shadowcog and train your class spells
Talk to Dannie Fizzwizzle. Buy the Grimoire of Blood Pact (Rank 1) if you can afford it. If not you will buy it later
Grind to level 6
Talk to Grif Wildheart and train your class spells. Train Arcane Shot
Talk to Ragnar Thunderbrew and accept Beer Basted Boar Ribs
Talk to Tannok Frosthammer and turn in Supplies to Tannok
Talk to Kreg Bilmn. Buy and equip a Small Throwing Knife
Talk to Hogral Bakkan inside in the backroom and train your class spells
Talk to Magis Sparkmantle inside upstairs and train your class spells
Talk to Azar Stronghammer inside upstairs and train your class spells
Talk to Maxan Anvol inside and accept Garments of the Light
Use Lesser Heal Rank 2 and then Power Word: Fortitude on Mountaineer Dolf
Talk to Maxan Anvol inside, turn in Garments of the Light, and train your class spells
Grind to level 6
Talk to Innkeeper Belm inside and set your Hearthstone to Thunderbrew Distillery. Buy as much Ice Cold Milk as you can afford
Talk to Innkeeper Belm inside and set your Hearthstone to Thunderbrew Distillery
Talk to Granis Swiftaxe inside and train your class spells
Travel to the Blacksmith
Talk to Grawn Thromwyn. Buy and equip a Gladius
Talk to Grawn Thromwyn. Buy and equip a Large Axe
Talk to Grawn Thromwyn. Buy and equip a Stiletto
Talk to Grawn Thromwyn. Buy and equip a Wooden Mallet
Talk to Tognus Flintfire and train Blacksmithing. This will allow you to make Rough Sharpening Stones which increase melee hits by +2 Damage. This is very significant early on
Talk to Tognus Flintfire and train Blacksmithing. This will allow you to make Rough Weightstones which increase melee hits by +2 Damage. This is very significant early on
Talk to Tharek Blackstone and accept Tools for Steelgrill
Talk to Pilot Bellowfiz and accept Stocking Jetsteam. Don't kill any Young Black Bears en-route

tips.text: Don't kill any Young Black Bears en-route

steps.description: Talk to Pilot Stonegear and accept The Grizzled Den
Talk to Beldin Steelgrill and turn in Tools for Steelgrill
Talk to Loslor Rudge and accept Ammo for Rumbleshot
Talk to Loslor Rudge. Buy a Mining Pick if you trained Blacksmithing
Talk to Yarr Hammerstone and train Mining
Cast Find Minerals
Kill Young Black Bears. Loot them for their Fur. Kill Crag Boars and Large Crag Boars. Loot them for their Chunks of Boar Meat and Crag Boar Ribs
Kill Crag Boars and Large Crag Boars. Loot them for their Crag Boar Ribs
Talk to Pilot Bellowfiz, turn in Stocking Jetsteam, and accept Evershine
Talk to Innkeeper Belm inside. Buy as much Freshly Baked Bread as you can afford
Talk to Innkeeper Belm inside. Buy as much Ice Cold Milk as you can afford
Enter the Grizzled Den
Kill Wendigos and Young Wendigos. Loot them for their Manes. Remember to keep an eye out for Copper Veins which yield Rough Stones so you can craft Rough Sharpening Stones

tips.text: Remember to keep an eye out for Copper Veins which yield Rough Stones so you can craft Rough Sharpening Stones

steps.description: Kill Wendigos and Young Wendigos. Loot them for their Manes. Remember to keep an eye out for Copper Veins which yield Rough Stones so you can craft Rough Weightstones

tips.text: Remember to keep an eye out for Copper Veins which yield Rough Stones so you can craft Rough Weightstones

steps.description: Kill Wendigos and Young Wendigos. Loot them for their Manes
Open the Ammo Crate. Loot it for Rumbleshot's Ammo
Talk to Hegnar Rumbleshot and turn in Ammo for Rumbleshot
Talk to Hegnar Rumbleshot. Buy and equip an Ornate Blunderbuss. Skip this step if you can't afford it
Grind to level 7
Kill Young Black Bears. Loot them for their Fur. Kill Crag Boars and Large Crag Boars. Loot them for their Chunks of Boar Meat and Crag Boar Ribs
Kill Crag Boars and Large Crag Boars. Loot them for their Crag Boar Ribs
Talk to Pilot Bellowfiz, turn in Stocking Jetsteam, and accept Evershine
Talk to Pilot Stonegear and turn in The Grizzled Den
Buy a Mining Pick
Grind to level 7
Grind nearby mobs to level 8
Talk to Hogral Bakkan inside in the backroom and train your class spells
Talk to Azar Stronghammer inside upstairs and train your class spells
Talk to Granis Swiftaxe inside and train your class spells
Talk to Grawn Thromwyn. Buy and equip a Gladius
Talk to Grawn Thromwyn. Buy and equip a Large Axe
Talk to Grawn Thromwyn. Buy and equip a Stiletto
Talk to Grawn Thromwyn. Buy and equip a Wooden Mallet
Talk to Innkeeper Belm inside. Buy up to 20 Freshly Baked Bread
Talk to Innkeeper Belm inside. Buy up to 10 Freshly Baked Bread
Travel toward Tundra MacGrann. Kill Boars, Bears and Wolves en-route
Talk to Tundra MacGrann and accept Tundra MacGrann's Stolen Stash
Travel toward Tundra MacGrann. Kill Boars, Bears and Wolves en-route
Talk to Tundra MacGrann and accept Tundra MacGrann's Stolen Stash
Travel to Brewnall Village
Talk to Keeg Gibn. Vendor trash
Talk to Keeg Gibn. Buy up to 20 Ice Cold Milk
Talk to Rejold Barleybrew, turn in Evershine, and accept A Favor for Evershine and The Perfect Stout
Talk to Marleth Barleybrew and accept Bitter Rivals
Kill Ice Claw Bears, Elder Crag Boars and Snow Leopards
Kill Elder Crag Boars. Loot them for their Crag Boar Ribs
Talk to Rejold Barleybrew, turn in A Favor for Evershine, and accept Return to Bellowfiz
If you have already turned in the quest Beer Basted Boar Ribs, grind until 4360+/4500xp
Talk to Innkeeper Belm inside. Buy a Rhapsody Malt and a Thunder Ale
Talk to Jarven Thunderbrew downstairs and turn in Distracting Jarven
Click the Unguarded Thunder Ale Barrel, turn in Bitter Rivals, and accept Return to Marleth
Talk to Ragnar Thunderbrew outside and turn in Beer Basted Boar Ribs
Grind to level 8
Talk to Grif Wildheart and train your class spells. Train Concussive Shot
Talk to Gimrizz Shadowcog and train your class spells. Train Fear
Talk to Gimrizz Shadowcog. Buy the Grimoire of Firebolt (Rank 2) if you can afford it. If not you will buy it later
Talk to Hogral Bakkan inside in the backroom and train your class spells
Talk to Azar Stronghammer inside upstairs and train your class spells
Talk to Granis Swiftaxe inside and train your class spells
Talk to Magis Sparkmantle inside upstairs and train your class spells. Train Polymorph
Talk to Maxan Anvol inside and train your class spells
Talk to Thamner Pol and train First Aid
Talk to Grawn Thromwyn. Buy and equip a Gladius
Talk to Grawn Thromwyn. Buy and equip a Large Axe
Talk to Grawn Thromwyn. Buy and equip a Stiletto
Talk to Grawn Thromwyn. Buy and equip a Wooden Mallet
Talk to Innkeeper Belm inside. Buy up to 30 Freshly Baked Bread
Talk to Innkeeper Belm inside. Buy up to 15 Freshly Baked Bread
Talk to Innkeeper Belm inside. Buy up to 30 Ice Cold Milk
Talk to Senir Whitebeard and accept Frostmane Hold
Talk to Pilot Stonegear and turn in The Grizzled Den
Talk to Pilot Bellowfiz and turn in Return to Bellowfiz. Choose the Camping Knife reward. Save it for later

tips.text: Choose the Camping Knife reward. Save it for later

steps.description: Talk to Pilot Bellowfiz and turn in Return to Bellowfiz
Talk to Razzle Sprysprocket and accept Operation Recombobulation
Travel to Shimmer Ridge. Follow the arrow and run up the mountain
Kill Frostmane Seers. Loot them for their Shimmerweed. Shimmerweed can also be looted from Shimmerweed Baskets on the ground
Open MacGrann's Meat Locker. Loot it for MacGrann's Dried Meats. Wait until Old Icebeard patrols out of the Cave. Once he patrols out of the Cave you can enter and loot MacGrann's Meat Locker

tips.text: Wait until Old Icebeard patrols out of the Cave. Once he patrols out of the Cave you can enter and loot MacGrann's Meat Locker
Click here for video reference

steps.description: Open MacGrann's Meat Locker. Loot it for MacGrann's Dried Meats

tips.text: Cast Polymorph on Old Icebeard

steps.description: Open MacGrann's Meat Locker. Loot it for MacGrann's Dried Meats

tips.text: Cast Fear on Old Icebeard

steps.description: Talk to Tundra MacGrann and turn in Tundra MacGrann's Stolen Stash
Talk to Keeg Gibn. Buy up to 10 more Ice Cold Milk
Talk to Keeg Gibn. Vendor trash
Talk to Rejold Barleybrew, turn in The Perfect Stout, and accept Shimmer Stout
Talk to Marleth Barleybrew and turn in Return to Marleth
Kill Leper Gnomes. Loot them for their Gears and Cogs
Grind to level 9
Enter Frostmane Hold
Kill Frostmane Headhunters
Drop down to this location to explore Frostmane Hold.

tips.text: If there are mobs below, clear around normally and do NOT drop down

steps.description: Kill Frostmane Headhunters
Hearth or travel to Kharanos
Talk to Razzle Sprysprocket and turn in Operation Recombobulation
Talk to Senir Whitebeard, turn in Frostmane Hold, and accept The Reports
Talk to Hogral Bakkan inside in the backroom and accept Road to Salvation
Talk to Thamner Pol and train First Aid
Talk to Razzle Sprysprocket and turn in Operation Recombobulation
Talk to Grif Wildheart and accept Taming the Beast
Use the Taming Rod on a Large Crag Boar

tips.text: Use the Taming Rod on a Large Crag Boar

steps.description: Talk to Grif Wildheart, turn in Taming the Beast, and accept Taming the Beast
Use the Taming Rod on a Snow Leopard

tips.text: Use the Taming Rod on a Snow Leopard

steps.description: Talk to Grif Wildheart, turn in Taming the Beast, and accept Taming the Beast
Use the Taming Rod on an Ice Claw Bear

tips.text: Use the Taming Rod on an Ice Claw Bear

steps.description: Talk to Grif Wildheart, turn in Taming the Beast, and accept Training the Beast
Grind until you have 10s30c, then run into Ironforge
Travel to Ironforge
Talk to Belia Thundergranite and turn in Training the Beast
Talk to Bixi Wobblebonk and train Thrown
Talk to Brenwyn Wintersteel down stairs. Buy a Balanced Throwing Dagger and equip it
Exit Ironforge
Talk to Rudra Amberstill and accept Protecting the Herd

Kill Vagash. Loot him for his Fang. This quest is difficult. Find a group for him if needed. Skip this step if you're unable to find a group or solo him. Watch the video below before you attempt to kill Vagash. It can be soloed on any class

tips.text: This quest is difficult. Find a group for him if needed. Skip this step if you're unable to find a group or solo him
Watch the video below before you attempt to kill Vagash. It can be soloed on any class
Click here for video reference

steps.description: Talk to Rudra Amberstill and turn in Protecting the Herd. Choose Coldridge Hammer as your reward. Don't worry if you can't equip it yet, you will train 2H Maces very soon!

tips.text: Choose Coldridge Hammer as your reward. Don't worry if you can't equip it yet, you will train 2H Maces very soon!

steps.description: Talk to Rudra Amberstill and turn in Protecting the Herd
Travel to Gol'Bolar Quarry
Talk to Cook Ghilm and train Cooking
Talk to Kazan Mogosh. Buy Freshly Baked Bread if needed
Talk to Kazan Mogosh. Buy Freshly Baked Bread and Ice Cold Milk if needed
Talk to Senator Mehr Stonehallow and Foreman Stonebrow, and accept The Public Servant and Those Blasted Troggs!
Kill Rockjaw Skullthumpers and Rockjaw Bonesnappers
Talk to Foreman Stonebrow and Senator Mehr Stonehallow, and turn in Those Blasted Troggs! and The Public Servant
Grind to level 10
Talk to Pilot Hammerfoot and accept The Lost Pilot
Click the Dwarven Corpse, turn in The Lost Pilot, and accept A Pilot's Revenge
Kill Mangeclaw. Loot him for his Claw
Talk to Pilot Hammerfoot and turn in A Pilot's Revenge
Talk to Mountaineer Barleybrew, turn in Shimmer Stout, and accept Stout to Kadrell
Travel to Loch Modan
Talk to Mountaineer Cobbleflint and accept In Defense of the King's Lands

quests.name: In Defense of the King's Lands

steps.description: Talk to Captain Rugelfuss in the bunker and accept The Trogg Threat
Talk to Mountaineer Kadrell, turn in Stout to Kadrell, and accept Rat Catching and Mountaineer Stormpike's Task. Mountaineer Kadrell patrols the road through Thelsamar

tips.text: Mountaineer Kadrell patrols the road through Thelsamar

steps.description: Talk to Vidra Hearthstove and accept Thelsamar Blood Sausages
Talk to Yanni Stoutheart. Buy a Small Brown Pouch if needed
Talk to Innkeeper Hearthstove and set your Hearthstone to Thelsamar
Talk to Brock Stoneseeker and accept Honor Students
Talk to Mountaineer Kadrell, turn in Stout to Kadrell, and accept Rat Catching and Mountaineer Stormpike's Task. Mountaineer Kadrell patrols the road through Thelsamar

tips.text: Mountaineer Kadrell patrols the road through Thelsamar

steps.description: Kill Elder Black Bears. Loot them for their Bear Meat. Kill Mountain Boars. Loot them for their Boar Intestines. Kill Forest Lurkers. Loot them for their Ichor. Save any Chunks of Boar Meat to use for leveling Cooking later. Don't go out of your way to complete this right now. You'll come back to Loch Modan soon

tips.text: Save any Chunks of Boar Meat to use for leveling Cooking later
Don't go out of your way to complete this right now. You'll come back to Loch Modan soon

steps.description: Travel north to the Algaz Station
Talk to Mountaineer Stormpike, turn in Mountaineer Stormpike's Task, and accept Stormpike's Order and Filthy Paws
Talk to Mountaineer Stormpike, turn in Mountaineer Stormpike's Task, and accept Stormpike's Order
Die and respawn at Thelsamar
Talk to Vidra Hearthstove and turn in Thelsamar Blood Sausages
Talk to Thorgrum Borrelson, turn in Honor Students, and accept Ride to Ironforge
Talk to Thorgrum Borrelson and fly to Ironforge
Talk to Golnir Bouldertoe, turn in Ride to Ironforge, and accept Gryth Thurden
Talk to Gryth Thurden, turn in Gryth Thurden, and accept Return to Brock. Do NOT fly anywhere

tips.text: Do NOT fly anywhere

steps.description: Talk to Senator Barin Redstone and turn in The Reports
Talk to Buliwyf Stonehand and train 2h Maces. Equip the Coldridge Hammer now if you didn't earlier

tips.text: Equip the Coldridge Hammer now if you didn't earlier

steps.description: Talk to Gryth Thurden, turn in Gryth Thurden, and accept Return to Brock. Do NOT fly anywhere

tips.text: Do NOT fly anywhere

steps.description: Enter the Deeprun Tram
Talk to Monty on the middle platform and accept Deeprun Rat Roundup
Use the Rat Catcher's Flute on Deeprun Rats

tips.text: Use the Rat Catcher's Flute on Deeprun Rats

steps.description: Talk to Monty, turn in Deeprun Rat Roundup, and accept Me Brother, Nipsy
Take the Tram to Stormwind. Level your First Aid and Cooking if needed while waiting for the Tram. You will need your First Aid to be 80 for a quest at level 24

tips.text: Level your First Aid and Cooking if needed while waiting for the Tram
You will need your First Aid to be 80 for a quest at level 24

steps.description: Take the Tram to Stormwind. Level your First Aid and Cooking if needed while waiting for the Tram

tips.text: Level your First Aid and Cooking if needed while waiting for the Tram

steps.description: Talk to Nipsy when you get off the Tram and turn in Me Brother, Nipsy. Nipsy is on the center platform

tips.text: Nipsy is on the center platform

steps.description: Enter Stormwind
Talk to Grimand Elmore and accept Stormpike's Delivery
Talk to Furen Longbeard and turn in Stormpike's Order
Travel to the Stormwind Cathedral
Talk to High Priestess Laurena, train your class spells, and turn in Desperate Prayer
Talk to High Priestess Laurena and train Desperate Prayer
Talk to Ilsa and train your class spells. Accept A Warrior's Training
Enter the Tavern
Talk to Harry Burlguard, turn in A Warrior's Training, and accept Bartleby the Drunk
Talk to Bartleby, turn in Bartleby the Drunk, and accept Beat Bartleby
Attack Bartleby. He will submit at 1%
Talk to Bartleby, turn in Beat Bartleby, and accept Bartleby's Mug
Talk to Harry Burlguard and turn in Bartleby's Mug
Travel to The Slaughtered Lamb and go downstairs
Talk to Ursula Deline and train your class spells
Talk to Gakin the Darkbinder and accept Surena Caledon
Talk to Woo Ping and train 1h Swords
Talk to Woo Ping and train Staves
Talk to Woo Ping and train 1h Swords and Staves
Talk to Woo Ping and train 2h Swords
Talk to Innkeeper Allison and set your Hearthstone to Stormwind
Talk to Gunther Weller. Buy a Cutlass and equip it in your Main-Hand. Equip the Craftsman's Dagger from earlier in your Off-Hand

tips.text: Buy a Cutlass and equip it in your Main-Hand. Equip the Craftsman's Dagger from earlier in your Off-Hand

steps.description: Talk to Thurman Mullby. Buy a Keen Throwing Knife. Equip it when you're level 11

tips.text: Buy a Keen Throwing Knife. Equip it when you're level 11
